underlying_goal: To improve a script that closes Mac apps by preventing infinite loops and handling slow-closing apps gracefully.
primary_success: Transforming a basic script into a more robust and feature-rich tool by adding timeout protection, parallel execution, and a configuration for special-casing slow applications.
brief_summary: The user wanted to fix a script that could get stuck in an infinite loop. Claude added timeout and stuck-detection logic. Based on user feedback, it also added a feature to handle slow-closing apps and parallelized some operations for speed. The work was then committed and pushed.
